summary:
Propranolol is a medicine used to treat many health problems, like high blood pressure and irregular heartbeats. It can also help with anxiety, migraines, and tremors. You can take it as a pill or get it through an IV. The pill starts working in about an hour.

Common side effects include stomach issues. Asthma symptoms might get worse. It's not safe for pregnant women but is okay for breastfeeding moms. Propranolol has been around since the 1960s and is a very common medicine.
title: Propranolol
